entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Snow or ice pellets mixed with freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Local ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
